verbose_text: Accordingly, the present study demonstrated that the silencing of CCN1 using CCN1 siRNA significantly inhibited endothelial cell proliferation and promoted endothelial cell apoptosis, thus interfering with angiogenesis, as observed in the retinas of the mouse pups with OIR.
evidence: CCN1 using CCN1 siRNA significantly inhibited endothelial cell proliferation and promoted endothelial cell apoptosis
